attr.principle: bacterial overgrowth increases folate and decreases cobalamin
attr.limitations: normal results do not rule out SIBO

reference: Rutgers HC, Batt RM, Elwood CM, Lamport A. Small intestinal bacterial overgrowth in dogs with chronic intestinal disease. J Am Vet Med Assoc 1995;206:187-19; Bissett SA, Guilford WG, Spohr A. Breath hydrogen testing in small animal practice. Comp Cont Educ 1997;19:916-931

attr.limitations: found in only 50-60% of SIBO cases

reference: Bissett SA, Guilford WG, Spohr A. Breath hydrogen testing in small animal practice. Comp Cont Educ 1997;19:916-931

attr.principle: detects increased hydrogen from bacterial fermentation

reference: Bissett SA, Guilford WG, Spohr A. Breath hydrogen testing in small animal practice. Comp Cont Educ 1997;19:916-931; Ludlow CL, Davenport DJ. Small intestinal bacterial overgrowth. In: Bonagura JD, ed. Current Veterinary Therapy XIII. Philadelphia, WB Saunders, 1999: 637-641

attr.principle: quantitative bacterial culture of duodenal juice
attr.limitations: technically difficult and may miss some cases

reference: Rutgers HC, Batt RM, Elwood CM, Lamport A. Small intestinal bacterial overgrowth in dogs with chronic intestinal disease. J Am Vet Med Assoc 1995;206:187-19; Bissett SA, Guilford WG, Spohr A. Breath hydrogen testing in small animal practice. Comp Cont Educ 1997;19:916-931

attr.method: broad-spectrum antibiotics like metronidazole or tylosin

reference: What is Canine Small Intestine Bacterial Overgrowth (SIBO)?
